Text: Thanks a bunch for posting all these books. There are not too many posts of the ebooks as it was it took me several days to get them all so I will share. I read the one book Martin the Warrior before and wanted to read more as I saw some of the series on television when it aired. Will seed of course for as long as I can as I am moving soon. Thanks again. Was gonna post this on all but if any have downloaded the first 5 they will get them all lol
